answer_found_by_llm: The script uses package management commands: `apt-get install openssl --yes`, `yum install openssl -y`, `apt-get install curl --yes`, `apt-get install wget --yes`, `yum install curl -y`, `yum install wget -y`. It attempts to delete logs using the command: `rm -rf /var/log/yum*`.
The script appends an unusual file extension represented by non-standard characters (e.g., `¢`) to encrypted files.
